permafrost.tundra.net.uri

Class URIHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.net.uri.URIHelper

  • public final class URIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with URIs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.nio.charset.Charset DEFAULT_CHARSET
      The default character set used for URI strings.
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_CHARSET_NAME
      The default character set name used for URI strings.
      static java.lang.String URI_PATH_DELIMITER
      The character used to delimit the items in a URI's path.
      static java.lang.String URI_QUERY_DELIMITER
      The character used to delimit the start of a URI's query string.
      static java.lang.String URI_USER_PASSWORD_DELIMITER
      The character used to delimit the user from the password in a URI's authority section.

      • parse

        public static com.wm.data.IData parse(java.lang.String input)
                               throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Parses a URI string into an IData representation.
        Parameters:
        input - The URI string to be parsed.
        Returns:
        An IData representation of the given URI.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If the given string is an invalid URI.

                             throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Emits a URI given as an IData document as a string.
        Parameters:
        input - An IData containing a specific URI structure to be serialized.
        Returns:
        The URI string representing the given IData.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If the given string is an invalid URI.

        public static com.wm.data.IData normalize(com.wm.data.IData input)
                                   throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Normalizes a IData URI structure, refer: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/net/URI.html#normalize().
        Parameters:
        input - The IData document representing a URI structure to be normalized.
        Returns:
        The normalized URI IData document.
        Throws:

      • substitute

        public static java.lang.String substitute(java.lang.String uri,
                                          com.wm.data.IData scope)
                                   throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException,
                                          java.net.URISyntaxException
        Performs variable substitution on the components of the given URI string.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI string to perform variable substitution on.
        scope - The scope variables are resolved against.
        Returns:
        The resulting URI string after variable substitution.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs during substitution.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If the given string is not a valid URI.

                              throws java.net.URISyntaxException

        Parameters:
        input - An IData containing a specific URI structure.
        Returns:
        The resulting URI object representing the given IData.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If the given IData document represents an invalid URI.
